error.same_host: Cannot use the same host for NethVoice and NethVoice CTI

settings.nethvoice_host_number_not: NethVoice host must be an FQDN, not an IP address
settings.title: Settings
settings.change_domain_provider_warning_title: User and extension settings will reset
settings.change_domain_provider_warning_descripti: Changing the account provider will reset all user and extension configurations.
settings.nethvoice_host_format: Must be a valid domain name.
settings.nethcti_ui_host_format: Must be a valid domain name.
settings.proxy_not_installed_description: NethVoice Proxy needs to be installed before configuring NethVoice.
settings.admin_password: Admin password to access user interface
settings.request_le_certificates_tooltip: Requests Let's Encrypt TLS certificates automatically for @:settings.nethvoice_host and @:settings.nethcti_ui_host . Disabling this option deletes the existing certificates (if any). You can also view or delete them in Cluster settings > TLS certificates.

welcome.no_domain_configured_description: You can create an internal OpenLDAP provider now, or set up a provider manually in {domainsAndUsers}.
welcome.account_provider_step_description: Use an existing account provider or create a new internal OpenLDAP on {node}. You can add or configure providers anytime in {domainsAndUsers} page.
welcome.create_openldap_provider: Create an OpenLDAP account provider on {node}
welcome.proxy_missing_on_node: NethVoice Proxy is not installed on {node}
welcome.proxy_missing_on_node_description: NethVoice requires a proxy application on the same node.
welcome.configuration_incomplete_description: Resume the setup wizard to start using NethVoice.

proxy.address_and_iface_dont_match_message: For the devices in the PBX local network to work correctly, the 'Hairpin NAT' feature — also known as 'NAT reflection', 'NAT hairpinning', 'NAT on a stick' or 'Loopback NAT' — must be enabled on the firewall (specifically, on the device that manages the NAT of the public IP).
proxy.addresses_format: Must be in IPv4 address format
proxy.domain_helper: FQDN of the proxy. Must be a valid domain name
proxy.address_helper: IPv4 address expected to receive VoIP traffic
proxy.address_tooltip: This is required only if it differs from @:welcome.proxy.network_interface address. The address is filled automatically based on the resolved FQDN above, but you can change it if needed.
proxy.proxy_already_configured_description: You can change these settings on the Settings page of {proxyModule}.
proxy.address_cannot_be_same_as_iface: Enter the public IP address only if it differs from the network interface IP address

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.call_transcription_warning_description: Transcriptions are enabled for every call. Your Deepgram credits may run out quickly if you have many calls.
integrations.deepgram_api_key_tooltip: To use call and voicemail transcription, you need a Deepgram API key. You can get one by signing up at {deepgramLink}.

rebranding.title: Rebranding
rebranding.rebranding_tooltip: Customize NethVoice with your own brand identity: change the product name, logos, and login background to match your company style.
rebranding.rebranding_favicon_url_tooltip: Displayed in the browser tab. Recommended size: 32x32 px
rebranding.public_url_image_helper: Public URL of the image, recommended .svg format
rebranding.login_illustration_tooltip: Show or hide the illustration over the login page background
rebranding.rebranding_not_activated_yet_description: This feature allows you to customize the NethVoice interface with your own brand identity — including product name, logos, and background images. To enable it, contact our sales team.
rebranding.mailto_sales_body:
Hello,

I would like to activate the rebranding feature for my NethVoice installation. Please provide me with the necessary information and steps to proceed.

Thank you.

hotel.title: Hotel
hotel.subscription_required: Hotel module requires an active subscription
hotel.fias_host_helper: Hostname or IPv4 address of the FIAS server
